Package applicationLayer

Class ConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • applicationLayer.ConfigurationService
  • public class ConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to get configuration data from the data layer and calculating the price of all selected options added. The method getConfiguration provides data for a specific model, the method calculatePrice calculates the price for the currently selected configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> enginePriceHashMap
      HashMap to store the name as Key and the Price as Value of the engines for easy access later on.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> modelPriceHashMap
      HashMap to store the name as Key and the Price as Value of the models for easy access later on.
      private ReadJson readJson
      Instance of ReadJson class to read the JSON document.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> seatsPriceMap
      HashMap to store the name as Key and the Price as Value of the seats for easy access later on.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​SubConfigurationDTO> subConfigurationDTOHashMap
      HashMap to store the SubConfigurationDTO objects for easy access later on.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> transmissionPriceHashMap
      HashMap to store the name as Key and the Price as Value of the transmissions for easy access later on.

    • Method Detail

      • calculatePrice

        public int calculatePrice​(java.lang.String model,
                          java.lang.String engine,
                          java.lang.String transmission,
                          java.lang.String seats)
        This method is invoked from the presentation Layer. It first gets the price for model, engine, transmission and seats, then returns the sum of them.
        Parameters:
        model - attribute name of the model, after which the HashMap gets searched
        engine - attribute name of the engine, after which the HashMap gets searched
        transmission - attribute name of the transmission, after which the HashMap gets searched
        seats - attribute name of the seats, after which the HashMap gets searched
        Returns:
        the sum of all prices

      • getConfiguration

        public ConfigurationDTO getConfiguration()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method calls readJson and splits the different ArrayLists of the ConfigurationDAO object into the corresponding ArrayLists of the return object ConfigurationDTO. It also fills the HashMaps with name and price of the current object. The method only gets called once.
        Returns:
        a instance of ConfigurationDTO
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the JSON file is faulty or has the wrong syntax

      • getSubConfiguration

        public SubConfigurationDTO getSubConfiguration​(java.lang.String model)
        This method returns a SubConfiguration object for the given model name. This indicates which SubConfigurations are compatible with the model.
        Parameters:
        model - name of the model
        Returns:
        SubConfiguration object
